item.title: CS134-lecture-20210610
item.description: Relational model cont. # Weak entity # Notice that the employee will be the owner of the depending weak entity. The primary key will be part of the foreign key and the weak attribute. Remember, primary keys are underlined foreign keys have arrows pointing to the other reference Multivalues attributes # Consider this ER-diagram, We can handle this in our relational model by creating another table called dept_locations,
